dict.string: Brighten up your skin to its natural tone

What can spent coffee grounds do? They contain antioxidants which are great for your skin, while at the same time reducing the appearance of cellulites. Let's simulate how to make the scrub now, shall we?
You have finished the simulation of making your coffee scrub using spent coffee grounds. Would you like to get the real stuffs so you can get your hands on it?

array.string: How to use body scrub  Penggunaan body scrub dapat dilakukan dengan mandi terlebih dahulu (Hindari air panas karena dapat membuat kulit kering). Gunakan body scrub dengan cara melulur semua bagian tubuh dari ujung kaki sampai leher. Setelah scrub sudah digunakan, tunggu 5-10 menit. Bilas dengan air bersih.
Coffee scrub can smooth out your skin, exfoliate dead skin cells, and hide cellulites. As a bonus, spent coffee grounds also contains antioxidants which is great for your skin!
So, are you ready to try it out at home?

dict.string: Hilangkan bau di dalam ruangan dan kulkas anda dengan trik berikut ini!

Ampas kopi dapat digunakan untuk menghilangkan bau tidak sedap dalam bagasi mobil Anda, di toilet, dan bahkan di dalam kulkas anda. Dapat bertahan selama sebulan dengan komposisi yang tepat. Anda sekarang dapat membuat penghilang bau aroma kopi dengan paket yang telah kami sediakan di toko kami tanpa perlu repot-repot pergi mencari bahan bakunya
You have finished the simulation of making your coffee scrub using coffe grounds. Would you like to get the real stuffs so you can do some real hands on
